description: Array giving susceptibility of 2-dimensional Ising model for 1 particle excitation (read by antidiagonals).
links: A. J. Guttmann, Indicators of solvability for lattice models, Discrete Math., 217 (2000), 167-189 (chi_1 of Section 3).
I. Syozi, S. Naya, Symmetrical properties of two-dimensional Ising lattices, Prog. Theor. Phys., 24 (1960), 829-839.
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jun 19 2000
